item.description:
Our typical potluck dinner and a meeting, except that we have moved it to Saturday evening to accomodate some of the officer's schedules. We'll meet at Gloria's in Windsor.

Bring your calendar!
Got an idea for a club event? Bring details!
Bring a favorite board game and since it's Saturday, we'll play a round or two after the meeting!
And when you reply, let us know what you can bring for the potluck dinner.

Got a tall friend? Bring them too!

Because this event is in a private home, you must RSVP for directions.
item.name: November dinner and a Meeting
